>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.0yJjfyvWg5pDLcVR]{Conditions}

You flee from the source of your fear as best you can.

If you are unable to flee, you can instead fight.

You take a â€“2 penalty to ability checks, attack rolls, saving throws, and skill checks.

You can use special abilities, including spells, to flee; indeed, you must use such means if they are the only way you have to escape while you are @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.DtwiUWi8dpzkq4tM]{Frightened}.

If you are already @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.DtwiUWi8dpzkq4tM]{Frightened} and become subject to an additional effect that would cause you to be @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.DtwiUWi8dpzkq4tM]{Frightened}, the duration of the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.DtwiUWi8dpzkq4tM]{Frightened} condition increases by the duration of the second effect.
